description: Jake (played by Nick Capra) has been secretly in love and carrying on a relationship with his boyfriend, Daniel (played by Dirk Caber) for a long time now, but it’s a part of his life he keeps from his stepson, Tony (played by Dakota Payne). The quiet dynamic of their relationship hurts Daniel, but he’s also weak in the presence of Nick’s alpha-daddy persona, and despite his hurt feelings, they always end up having incredibly passionate bareback sex.
series: Secrets My Daddy Never Told Me
title: TRAILER: Nick Capra Fucks His Lover Dirk Caber
